title: Optovar
description: Optovars are magnification changing devices originally developed by Zeiss, which provide additional magnification that can be beneficial when a desired field of view is required for the imaging sensor. Magnification changer components are placed before the tube lens within the infinity space of the optical system. Typical magnification increments are: 1.25x, 1.6x, and 2x
